00028    /* 
00029    * Constructor.
00030    */
00031    NvtIntegrator::NvtIntegrator(Simulation& simulation)
00032     : TwoStepIntegrator(simulation),
00033       prefactors_(),
00034       T_target_(1.0),
00035       T_kinetic_(1.0),
00036       xi_(0.0),
00037       xiDot_(0.0),
00038       tauT_(1.0),
00039       nuT_(1.0)
00040    {
00041       // Note: Within the constructor, the method parameter "simulation" hides 
00042       // the simulation() method name.
00043 
00044       // Precondition
00045       if (!simulation.energyEnsemble().isIsothermal() ) {
00046          UTIL_THROW("Simulation energy ensemble is not isothermal");
00047       }
00048    }
00049 
00050    /*
00051    * Destructor.
00052    */
00053    NvtIntegrator::~NvtIntegrator()
00054    {}

00056    /* 
00057    * Read parameter and configuration files, initialize simulation.
00058    */
00059    void NvtIntegrator::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00060    {
00061       //readBegin(in, "NvtIntegrator");
00062       read<double>(in, "dt",   dt_);
00063       read<double>(in, "tauT", tauT_);
00064       //readEnd(in);
00065 
00066       nuT_ = 1.0/tauT_;
00067       int nAtomType = simulation().nAtomType();
00068       if (!prefactors_.isAllocated()) {
00069          prefactors_.allocate(nAtomType);
00070       }
00071 
00072    }
00073 
00074    void NvtIntegrator::setup()
00075    {
00076       #if 0
00077       atomStorage().clearSnapshot();
00078       exchanger().exchange();
00079       pairPotential().buildCellList();
00080       if (!UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00081          atomStorage().transformGenToCart(boundary());
00082       }
00083       pairPotential().buildPairList();
00084       atomStorage().makeSnapshot();
00085       simulation().computeForces();
00086       #endif
00087 
00088       // Exchange atoms, build pair list, compute forces.
00089       setupAtoms();
00090 
00091       simulation().diagnosticManager().setup();
00092 
00093       // Calculate prefactors for acceleration
00094       double dtHalf = 0.5*dt_;
00095       double mass;
00096       int nAtomType = prefactors_.capacity();
00097       for (int i = 0; i < nAtomType; ++i) {
00098          mass = simulation().atomType(i).mass();
00099          prefactors_[i] = dtHalf/mass;
00100       }
00101 
00102       // Initialize nAtom_, xiDot_, xi_
00103       simulation().computeKineticEnergy();
00104       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00105       atomStorage().computeNAtomTotal(domain().communicator());
00106       #endif
00107       if (domain().isMaster()) {
00108          T_target_ = simulation().energyEnsemble().temperature();
00109          nAtom_  = atomStorage().nAtomTotal();
00110          T_kinetic_ = simulation().kineticEnergy()*2.0/double(3*nAtom_);
00111          xiDot_ = (T_kinetic_/T_target_ -1.0)*nuT_*nuT_;
00112       }
00113       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00114       bcast(domain().communicator(), xiDot_, 0);
00115       #endif
00116       xi_ = 0.0;
00117 
00118    }
00119 
00120    void NvtIntegrator::integrateStep1()
00121    {
00122       Vector dv;
00123       Vector dr;
00124       double prefactor; // = 0.5*dt/mass
00125       double dtHalf = 0.5*dt_;
00126       double factor;
00127       AtomIterator atomIter;
00128 
00129    
00130       T_target_ = simulation().energyEnsemble().temperature();
00131       factor = exp(-dtHalf*(xi_ + xiDot_*dtHalf));
00132 
00133       // 1st half of velocity Verlet.
00134       atomStorage().begin(atomIter);
00135       for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00136          atomIter->velocity() *= factor;
00137          prefactor = prefactors_[atomIter->typeId()];
00138          dv.multiply(atomIter->force(), prefactor);
00139          atomIter->velocity() += dv;
00140          dr.multiply(atomIter->velocity(), dt_);
00141          atomIter->position() += dr;
00142       }
00143    }
00144 
00145    void NvtIntegrator::integrateStep2()
00146    {
00147       Vector dv;
00148       double prefactor; // = 0.5*dt/mass
00149       double dtHalf = 0.5*dt_;
00150       double factor;
00151       AtomIterator atomIter;
00152 
00153       T_target_ = simulation().energyEnsemble().temperature();
00154       factor = exp(-dtHalf*(xi_ + xiDot_*dtHalf));
00155 
00156       // 2nd half of velocity Verlet
00157       atomStorage().begin(atomIter);
00158       for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00159          prefactor = prefactors_[atomIter->typeId()];
00160          dv.multiply(atomIter->force(), prefactor);
00161          atomIter->velocity() += dv;
00162          atomIter->velocity() *=factor;
00163       }
00164 
00165       // Update xiDot_ and xi_
00166       simulation().computeKineticEnergy();
00167       if (domain().isMaster()) {
00168          xi_ += xiDot_*dtHalf;
00169          T_kinetic_ = simulation().kineticEnergy()*2.0/double(3*nAtom_);
00170          xiDot_ = (T_kinetic_/T_target_  - 1.0)*nuT_*nuT_;
00171          xi_ += xiDot_*dtHalf;
00172       }
00173       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00174       bcast(domain().communicator(), xiDot_, 0);
00175       bcast(domain().communicator(), xi_, 0);
00176       #endif
00177 
00178    }
00179 
00180 }
